articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Motorola Razr and Razr Ultra (2025) review: Cool as hell, but too much AI - Ars Technica
articles.description: The new Razrs are sleek, capable, and overflowing with AI features.

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Trump tells Apple’s CEO to stop expanding iPhone production in India - TechCrunch
articles.description: Speaking during a business summit in Doha, Trump said he met with Cook and asked him to stop building in India and instead increase production in the US.
articles.content: Earlier this month, Apple CEO Tim Cook said the company would start importing iPhones manufactured in India to meet the majority of demand stateside. It seems U.S. President Donald Trump is not happy… [+1478 chars]

articles.title: Always Tired? A Mini-Stroke You Didn’t Notice Could Be Why - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Mini-strokes can leave lasting exhaustion, despite a quick outward recovery.
articles.content:
Mini-strokes may lead to long-term fatigue in over half of patients, highlighting a hidden burden beyond initial recovery.
Fatigue may linger for a year after a mini-stroke, especially in people wit… [+3996 chars]
